synopsis: Vote to pass a bill that establishes marine reserves, marine protected areas, and seabird protected areas at Cape Falcon, Cascade Head, and Cape Perpetua.
name: SB 1510 - Establishes Marine Reserves - Oregon Key Vote
pg: Highlights: Specifies that the State Fish and Wildlife Commission may not impose prohibitions on fishing until data has been collected consistent with scientifically based monitoring plans (Sec. 3). Requires the Ocean Policy Advisory Council to submit a draft report to the Legislative Assembly no later than October 1, 2022, and a final report to the Legislative Assembly no later than March 1, 2023, regarding the establishment, study, monitoring, evaluation and enforcement of the pilot marine reserves, marine reserves, marine protected areas, and seabird protection area (Sec. 4). Specifies that this act will take effect upon passage (Sec. 5).
